name: Deeper Darkvision
description: The subject gains the ability to see 60 feet in total darkness and even magical darkness (such as might be created by a blacklight or deeper darkness spell). Deeper darkvision is black and white only but otherwise similar to normal sight. Material Component: A pinch of dried carrot or an agate.

name: Burrow, Mass
description: This spell functions like burrow, except that it affects multiple creatures.
target: One creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
